Martin H. Voss, MD - MSK Genitourinary Oncologist

adrFormatAddress: 353 E 68th St, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text:
There truly are no words to show the gratitude and admiration we have for Dr Voss and his team.

My wife was diagnosed with stage 4 kidney cancer that had spread to her lungs. To get that news was devastating, to say the very least. We are in our late 50's and have so much more to do. We live in a rural area of Pennsylvania and knew we could not get the care she needed locally.

We contacted the nurse navigator at MSK and they immediately went to work. I don't believe a day had past before they were requesting the scans the local hospital had taken and ask me overnight them. The following day, they asked if we could get NY the next day for the consultation. They simply could not have gotten everything done more efficiently.

I will never forget the anxiety and fear of the morning of our consultation. We sat in the park, just across the street from his office waiting for our appointment time, completely lost and emotionally spent wondering what was to come. Less than a week earlier our lives were normal and this day we are in NYC not knowing if we had many tomorrows left.. simply horrifying.

Cathy, his nurse, was absolutely wonderful. She is incredibly smart, knowledgeable and very thorough. She made us feel not so alone and had a very positive approach which we very much needed.

Dr Voss entered the room, spoke a few sentences and we immediately knew that this was exactly where she needed to be. There are not enough good things we can say about Dr Voss. He is so, so intelligent and you just know you are in capable hands. He is amazingly articulate. He talks to you in language that you comprehend.  He is compassionate and confident. He always has a plan and knows exactly what needs done without hesitation. If there were bumps along the road, they had a solution.

Also, Cathy has always been very prompt about responding to questions and concerns that come up at home via their portal.

Tracy and I can not say enough about the care she has received there and would beg you, not reccomend, beg you to give yourself what you deserve... the best! Go see Dr Voss!!

Our entire journey with Dr Voss, Cathy, and the entire MSK team has been nothing shy of miraculous. A specially thank you to Dr Hakimi, her surgeon, as well.

originalText.text: I was very lucky to find Dr. Voss 5 years ago when i was diagnosed with kidney cancer. Scared and not sure of the future... Dr. Voss was very understanding . he sent me to perform more tests , addressed all my concerns and even worries. I would highly recommend Dr. Voss and his team. Very caring and responsible group

Dr. Voss was very understanding . he sent me to perform more tests , addressed all my concerns and even worries. I would highly recommend Dr. Voss and his team. Very caring and responsible group

originalText.text:
I am incredibly grateful to have Dr. Voss as my oncologist during my cancer journey. His unwavering dedication, along with the expertise of his team, has made a profound impact on my overall experience and instilled in me a deep sense of trust.

Dr. Voss's attentiveness and commitment to his patients are truly remarkable. From our initial consultation, he took the time to thoroughly understand my medical history, concerns, and goals. Throughout my treatment, he has consistently demonstrated genuine care, always going above and beyond to ensure my well-being. I feel fortunate to have found an oncologist who genuinely listens, empathizes, and supports me every step of the way.

Dr. Voss's expertise in oncology is second to none. His comprehensive knowledge and understanding of the latest advancements in cancer treatment are evident in the personalized care he provides. He explains complex medical information in a compassionate and accessible manner, empowering me to make informed decisions about my treatment. I trust his judgment implicitly and find solace in knowing that he is constantly staying updated with the most current research and breakthroughs in the field.

Equally noteworthy is the exceptional support provided by Dr. Voss's team. From the moment I walk into the clinic, I am greeted with warmth and compassion. The nursing staff and medical assistants are not only highly skilled but also genuinely caring individuals who create a supportive and comforting environment. They have a remarkable ability to alleviate anxiety and ensure that I feel comfortable during my visits. The seamless coordination and communication among the team members reflect their professionalism and dedication to patient care.

Dr. Voss and his team approach my treatment with a comprehensive perspective. They proactively address not only the physical aspects of my condition but also the emotional and psychological impact of cancer. They provide resources, support groups, and referrals to other healthcare professionals when needed, ensuring that I receive the best possible care and support throughout my journey.

In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Voss and his team to anyone in need of an exceptional oncologist. Their compassionate care, combined with their expertise and dedication, sets them apart in the field of oncology. Under Dr. Voss's guidance, I have felt heard, supported, and confident in my treatment decisions. Choosing him as my oncologist has been one of the best decisions I have made, and I am deeply grateful for his unwavering commitment to my well-being.

originalText.text: Dr. Voss is the best doctor my wife and I have ever dealt with! He is kind,compassionate, and super knowledgeable. Dr. Voss has earned our total trust and sincere gratitude.

text.text: Dr. Voss is the best doctor my wife and I have ever dealt with! He is kind,compassionate, and super knowledgeable. Dr. Voss has earned our total trust and sincere gratitude.

originalText.text: Visited with Dr. Voss with my friend who has only one kidney and clear cell tumors.  He is amazing; recited a thorough summary of her 15 yr history in under a minute not missing a single event; spent generous and gracious time explaining options and encouragement but is the most unambiguous, clear communicator I have every met.  One leaves with certainty and a clear plan for most promising outcomes available.  He is a treasure.
